code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UserList(_ref){let{currentUserId,onSelectUser}=_ref;const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://react-chat-app-1-bz2b.onrender.com/api/users").then(res=>{setUsers(res.data.filter(u=>u.id!==currentUserId));});},[currentUserId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>onSelectUser(user),style:{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",cursor:"pointer",marginBottom:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:user.avatar,alt:"avatar",style:{width:30,height:30,borderRadius:"50%",marginRight:8}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:user.username})]},user.id))});}export default UserList;
